title: RRR
description: A tale of two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home.

title: Pathaan
description: An Indian agent races to stop a bio-terrorist threat.

title: Dangal
description: A father trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.

title: Jawan
description: A man driven by personal vengeance fights corruption.

title: Drishyam 2
description: A gripping sequel to the story of a man who will go to any length for his family.

title: HIT: The 2nd Case
description: A homicide detective tackles a new gruesome serial case.

title: Sacred Games
description: A troubled cop discovers a deeper conspiracy in Mumbai's criminal underworld.

title: Paatal Lok
description: An honest cop finds himself entangled in a dark web of politics and crime.

title: Mirzapur
description: Power, politics and bloodshed in the town of Mirzapur.

title: The Family Man
description: An undercover agent juggles between family and national duty.

title: Scam 1992
description: The rise and fall of stockbroker Harshad Mehta.

title: Asur
description: A psychological thriller blending mythology and science.

title: Hera Pheri
description: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper.

title: Chupke Chupke
description: A newly-wedded husband plays a practical joke on his in-laws with help from his wife and friends.

title: Andaz Apna Apna

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
description: An NRI and his wife arrive in India and decide to stay in his ancestral home, despite warnings about spirits.
